meanings.sent1: After the party, there were surfeits of snacks left uneaten.
meanings.sent2: The surfeits of toys in the room made it difficult to walk.
meanings.sent3: The surfeits of laughter during the comedy show filled the room with joy.
meanings.sent4: Her surfeits of kindness towards others made her a beloved friend.
meanings.sent5: The surfeits of stars in the night sky took her breath away.

meanings.definition: To indulge in something excessively, especially food or drink
meanings.sent1: He tends to surfeits on sweets whenever he feels stressed.
meanings.sent2: She surfeits on social media when she has free time.
meanings.sent3: The cat surfeits on catnip and then takes a long nap.
meanings.sent4: The students surfeit on pizza during their study break.
meanings.sent5: They surfeit on compliments after their successful performance.
